general information: Marketing Information The ViewSonic TD2240 is a 22" (21.5" viewable) 10-point projected capacitive multi-touch display with 1920x1080 native resolution. Windows 8 certified, the TD2240 delivers a smooth, responsive touch experience for a variety of Windows 8 applications for home entertainment, office work, education, or commercial use. An ergonomic dual-hinge stand provides a best-in-class touch experience with maximum comfort and productivity. The TD2240 also includes a MHL-enabled HDMI port, allowing you to display multimedia content from smartphones or tablets onto the larger screen of the TD2240. Other versatile connectivity options include DisplayPort, VGA, and a 4-port USB hub. A SuperClear VA wide viewing angle screen with 7H hardness provides excellent front-of-screen performance and durability.
